text: Good morning

I'd like to talk to you today about the Save the Children charity

Ok great.  Save the Children is an  international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.I don't know about you but in our current climate the rights and welfare of children has been on the forefront of my mind.  By helping Save the Children you can make a direct difference in a needy child's life.
YEAH I AM LASO SAVE CHILDREN  CHILDREN INTERNATIONAL . YEAH WE WILL MAKE BIG DIFFERENTS  NEED TO CHARITY CHILDREN  LIFE SAVE
Save the Children is a wonderful charity with international impact.  It's very sad to me that children in this world still go to bed hungry at night.
PINK CHARITY THAT CHILDREN WORLD AT NIGHT
All righty.  Are you willing to make a donation to Save the Children?  If so, you will be part of the solution to the problem.  I believe as humans its our moral responsibility to help those in need.
YES , I WILL DONATION THE SAVE CHILDREN. YEAH WE HAVE SOME OF THE ISSUES IN THE CASHING PROBLEMS. IN YOUR CHARITY DID YOU FACE ANY OTHER LIKE THAT?/

ITS OK   NO PROBLEM
How much would you like to donate to Save the Children?  Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.  You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
YOU FOR MONTH OR YEAR
